com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.provider

Class DatabaseProviderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.provider.DatabaseProviderFactory

  • public class DatabaseProviderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseProviders should register themselves here. The appropriate provider can be found using the methods of this class.
